question: Which Union Ministry announced the 'Nurturing Neighbourhoods Challenge Cohort'?
option2: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
option3: Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development
answer: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
The Smart Cities Mission, Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs, recently announced twenty-five shortlisted cities for the ‘Nurturing Neighbourhoods Challenge’ cohort.
This challenge is a three-year initiative aimed to support early childhood-friendly neighbourhoods under the Smart Cities Mission of the Central Government. Over 300 pilot projects were proposed in the challenge that would improve quality of life for over 12 lakh children.
